name: Blackwings
description:
This is the first game made at university, using Stencyl. It works... and has an ending... kind of. Even if its quite buggy and doesn't contain anything ground breaking. It was my first attempt at making a small adventure type game and has 3 characters, the first dungeon and the beginnings of an inventory system!

Putting it out there for prosperity and to keep track of where my games are on my portfolio website, if you like it let me know, Ive thought about going back and revisiting it when I have time.
